messages.content: The lane markings at Sector 18 are either faded or incorrect, causing chaos during peak hours.
{"Category":"Road Infrastructure","Sub-category":"Improper Lane Markings"}
There is no traffic police presence at Bus Stand, leading to rule violations and congestion.
{"Category":"Traffic Management","Sub-category":"Lack of Traffic Police"}
There are multiple potholes on the road near Tech Park causing traffic jams and vehicle damage.
{"Category":"Road Infrastructure","Sub-category":"Potholes"}
Public buses at City Center are overcrowded, making it difficult for passengers and leading to road chaos.
{"Category":"Public Transport","Sub-category":"Overcrowded Buses"}
The traffic signal at Railway Station has not been working for days, resulting in unmanaged traffic.
{"Category":"Traffic Management","Sub-category":"Signal Not Working"}
Vehicles are parked illegally at MG Road, reducing the usable road space and causing bottlenecks.
{"Category":"Parking Issues","Sub-category":"Illegal Parking"}
There are no zebra crossings at Sector 18, making it difficult and dangerous for pedestrians to cross.
{"Category":"Pedestrian Safety","Sub-category":"No Zebra Crossings"}
Heavy congestion is frequently observed at Ring Road due to poor management of traffic flow.
{"Category":"Traffic Management","Sub-category":"Congestion at Intersections"}
Pedestrian overpasses at Railway Station are unsafe or unusable, causing people to cross roads directly.
{"Category":"Pedestrian Safety","Sub-category":"Unsafe Overpasses"}

{"Category":"Parking Issues","Sub-category":"Lack of Parking Spaces"}
